name: Undestined
description:
Join the adventure of a small child on an journey to find her lost mother.

This game was made for the metroidvania month 8

Control :

  • Arrow key : Movement
  • Z : Jump
  • X : Trow Slime / tap again when red slime touch wall for instant eksplosion
  • A : Change Slime Atribute
  • S : Change Slime Atribute
  • Enter : Start/Pause
  • Support xbox controler
